text:
Hi Everyone,

I want use Custom Code to get data from other deals outside workflow.

Pretty much what i want to do is check if there is other deal in specific Pipeline in specific deal stage with the same name as the deal enrolled in current workflow.
If there is one i want to copy some properties vales from this deal to the one enrolled in workflow.

I am looking for a way to ‘reach’ other deals with custom code.
Is it possible?
